Title: The Lesson
Plot: Danny has found a potential new member of the gang, Trevor (played by Lee Ingleby). He's a short con artist, who's very good at what he does, but his marks are not always the greedy; he also targets the elderly and the poor...
GuestStars: Eileen Essel, Lee Cornes, Peter Shea, Brian Hickey, Rick Warren, Andrew Bridgemount, Eleanor Matsuura, Doreen Mantle, Lee Ingleby
